Member's Right and Responsibilities會員的權利與責任 
Rights
-Member has the right to:
-receive high quality healthcare
-receive medical treatment that meets acceptable standards
-receive clear description of the medical condition
-receive information about prescribed medication
-receive information about the side effects of the medication be instructed what to do if member experienced a 
side effect
-receive information about treatment proposed and alternative treatment that should be considered
-access any medical information about his/her condition and treatment
-accept or refuse any medication, investigation or treatment, and to be informed of the likely consequences of 
doing so
-have second opinion about medical condition
-receive information about what diagnostic tests are necessary
-receive information about the diagnostic test
-receive information about treatment after diagnostic test
Responsibilities
-Member has the responsibility to:
-give as much information as possible about the medical history and medical condition and any related details to 
healthcare provider for diagnosis
-comply with the instructions given by healthcare provider
-follow the prescribed medication
-follow the agreed treatment plan
-show his/her proper Membership Card
-keep an appointment or notify to cancel an appointment as early as possible
-avoid requesting false information or receipts from medical service providers
-avoid requesting any treatment or medication that is not related to a diagnosed illness
Bupa will not release any member’s information relating to his/her medical condition to other parties without 
his/her consent.
If a member has any question regarding the membership, please write to Bupa (Asia) Limited, 6/F, Tower 2, 
The Quayside, 77 Hoi Bun Road, Kwun Tong, Kowloon, Hong Kong.

權利
會員有權：
- 接受高質素的醫療服務
- 接受合乎水準的治療
- 清楚了解其健康狀況
- 清楚了解處方之藥物的資料
- 清楚了解藥物之副作用
- 知道當藥物出現副作用時所須採取的應變方法
- 詳細了解醫生建議的治療方法及其他可考慮的選擇
- 索閱有關其健康狀況及治療的任何資料
- 接受或拒絕任何藥物、診斷或治療，並了解其後果
- 索取有關其健康狀況的第二意見
- 清楚了解所須接受的診斷性檢驗
- 清楚了解關於診斷性檢驗的資料
- 清楚了解關於診斷性檢驗後所須進行之治療
責任
會員有責任：
- 向醫生透露所有病歷、健康狀況及有關之資料詳情以作診斷用途
- 遵照醫生指示
- 遵照醫生吩咐使用藥物
- 遵照已同意接受的治療進程
- 出示有效的會員證
- 遵守已預約的時間，如有變更應盡快通知醫生取消預約
- 不要求醫生提供不正確的資料或收據
